entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
